entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Strong type support in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #61947
  • [wasm] JS Interop tests failing with latest chrome - `JavaScript host object 'SharedArrayBuffer' not found` #61945
  • arm64 jitstress failing with `encoding_found` assert #61944
  • MAUI Startup Improvement #61941
    Future
  • Could emit branchless form of i >= 0 && j >= 0 for signed integers #61940
  • Number of jit tests failing with `needLabel` assert #61939
    7.0.0
  • Guard against partial cleanup of extracted files issue is happening again #61936
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration Binder attempts to bind to Readonly Static Property #61932
  • Expression.Convert fails to convert byte to nint. #61929
  • [iOS][tvOS] Generic math SByte and Int16 test failures #61920
  • Use of CoreCLR GC in conservative stack scanning mode #61919
  • Port rule CA1011 - Consider passing base types as parameters #61916
  • Unexpected behavior of TimeSpan.FromSeconds #61909
  • Investigate adding capture support for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #61904
    7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator support for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #61903
    7.0.0
  • Finish "simplified" regex codegen strategy #61902
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_ro\\Pause_ro.cmd #61901
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/disconnected/catchbeforetrybody_d/catchbeforetrybody_d.sh #61900
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Benchstones/BenchF/MatInv4/MatInv4/MatInv4.sh #61899
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/Crc32.Arm64/Crc32.Arm64_ro/Crc32.Arm64_ro.sh #61897
    7.0.0
  • Port re2 regex tests #61896
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [Perf] Changes at 11/17/2021 1:35:01 AM #61821
  • Mono jit/hardwareintrinsics/x86/x86base/pause tests failing #61693
  • Future of the IFormatter infrastructure, safe polymorphic deserialization (not just BinaryFormatter) #50909
    Future
  • Add SerializationInfo.TryGetValue API #42460
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a common base type for ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61516
    7.0.0
  • AES Encryption broken on Dot Net 6 #61918
  • IObjectReference binary deserialization for objects with circular references crashes #42636
    Future
  • Add MaxDepth to JsonWriterOptions #44947
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ``CompressionNative_InflateInit_`` and ``CompressionNative_DeflateInit_`` to clrcompression. #61910
  • JIT: Incorrectly optimized double-negation in face of inlining #61908
    7.0.0
  • system.text.regularexpressions.tests.regexmatchtests.match_cachedpattern_newtimeoutapplies #61794
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DsaArrayOffsetSignatureFormatTests.BadSignatureFormat #61578
  • Issues using debugger in Blazor WASM project since .NET 6 upgrade #61924
  • [Mono] Fix android rolling build failures #61343
    7.0.0
  • CryptoStream.Read adds "null" add the EOF #61886
  • Failed test System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.KeyGeneration.GenerateKey_2048 #61905
  • [HTTP] RemoveStalePools should never run in parallel #61505
    7.0.0
  • Regression in multiple benchmarks from value numbering #61375
    7.0.0
  • XXHash64/32 incorrect one-shot implementation #61878
  • FileStream does not lock file on mounted filesystem #61836
  • System.Linq.Parallel OrderedPipeliningMergeEnumerator.MoveNext is using API unsupported on browser #43752
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61946
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Cleanup some code using ECAlgorithm #61943
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type memory maps with placeholders #61933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61930
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update DI external tests for Stashbox #61928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #61927
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.IO
  • Disable several GenericMath tests on iOS/tvOS #61922
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Support zero-byte reads on HTTP response streams #61913
    area-System.Net.Http, .NET 7.0
  • Fix `optComputeLoopSideEffects` to account for HWI stores #61911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add backtracking loops, backreferences, and if-then-else constructs to Regex "simplified" code gen #61906
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extract ECAlgorithm from ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61753
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Fix regression in IsPrefix / IsSuffix benchmarks #61935
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Adding support for the X86Base.Pause intrinsic on Mono #61707
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Update list of analyzer diagnostics with JSON entries #61809
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize SpanHelpers<T>.IndexOf #60974
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add a JsonWriterOptions.MaxDepth property #61608
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use correct VN relation kind for redundant relop opts #61912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete Regex timeout tests with RegexOptions.Debug #61888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Do not explicitly pass type to `VNForMapStore` #61882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable some skipped Android tests #61771
    area-System.Net
  • Skip eventpipe_readevents for arm32 #58545
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor to allow OSR to switch to optimized #61851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix XXHash for stripe size #61881
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Default BuildTargetFramework to NetCoreAppCurrent for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource #61760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement use GeneratedDllImport #61805
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Rename CORINFO_FLG_CONTAINS_STACK_PTR to CORINFO_FLG_BYREF_LIKE #61907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP] Scavange fix #61530
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Mark PLINQ as enabled in WASM and make browser compat changes #58227
    arch-wasm, area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • Fix a few special cases of projects with command line arguments #61758
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Actually use TargetOS=AnyOS in the build-test-job (Try 2) #61801
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1481838 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Test chromebug #61856
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stabilize host's UpgradeCode and ProviderKey #61810
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Force console #61854
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Mono hot reload reorg and beginning (disabled) add method support #61853
    area-EnC-mono
  • Baseline System.Speech for trimming errors #61874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete `NumChildren`, `GetChild` and `gtGetChildPointer` #61875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete dead code from `InferStructOpSizeAlign` #61880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Exclude the managed code around libproc on iOS/tvOS (#61590) #61659
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-ios, 6.0.x
  • [WASM] Fix v8 trimming tests on windows #53698
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Fix parsing of ping error replies on raw sockets #61592
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent configurations to Microsoft.Extensions libraries #61867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • null terminated string (Pinvoke) #1741

Updated

  • Publishing static library should also publish other necessary static libs #1733

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] lower args using PUTARG_TYPE #1744

Merged

  • Fix marshaling of ByVal strings #1743

Updated

  • Custom marshaller work. #1723
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add field to LclVarDsc to represent LLVM arg index #1716

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • RuntimeIdentifier in CSproj causing the CLR exception while debugging. #22709
  • FormClosing.Cancel not working #22707

Closed

  • Upgrading to .NET6 breaks unit tests which launch 32-bit .NET processes #22647

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge pull request #22284 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-parallelnonwindows #22722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22721
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719
  • set encoding to UTF8 in case output is redirected (sdk-wide) #22713
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22641
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix version comparison for dotnet tool install #22684
    Area-Tools
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Is there any reason why I cannot deconstruct dynamic values into typed variables? #5461

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • [Open Question]: `required` parsing #5439
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigate to original source from metadata fails to handle documentation comments #57924
    17.1
  • Intellisense changes existing, correct variable to capitalized option with same name (record class parameters) #57923
  • IDE0064: False positive when all readonly fields of a struct are static #57920
  • Lambdas + custom delegate types + type inference = breaking change in C# 10 #57916

Closed

  • Introduce parameter is replacing one file with another file's contents #57781
    17.1
  • Add an option for decompiled view to have everything expanded #57931
  • CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider error when refactoring in VS2022 #57919
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit #57719
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpFindReferences.FindReferencesToCtor #57552
    17.1
  • C# 9 => C# 10 upgrade causing CS0411 with an extension method #57630
    17.1
  • Convert to block scoped code fix produces incorrect output if namespace declaration is inside a ifdef #57564
    17.1
  • "Find All References"/"Go to implementation" blocks editing for a significant amount of time #41374
    Backlog
  • [SourceLink] Ensure embedded source is shown with the right encoding #57350
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for unique FixIdDefinition exports #57933
    Area-IDE
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE
  • Fix remove-unused-variable for top-level-statements #57930
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify representation of an implicit `Index` indexer over an array and non-array types. #57918
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Attempt to mark EqualityContract property accessor as not auto-implemented #57917
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • draft #57915
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57921
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixes Introduce Parameter Replacing File Content Bug #57922
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge FixIdDefinition with the same name #57883
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not call IsFullyLoadedAsync from JTF #57813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix deadlock switching the project context dropdown #57833
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Tweak SemaphoreDisposer to null out the held semaphore #57831
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix deadlock during solution load #57829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add back option to allow users to disable async lightbulbs #57808
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid eagerly running formatting or simplification for Extract Method #57838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Properly support TableEntryNavigateEventArgs.ShouldActivate #57889
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle trivia better when converting to file scoped namespaces #57913
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Unify the namespace for our FatalError type #57887
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38583
  • Debug deployed asp.net core application in IIS is not working #38582
  • Pseudo header string reuse broken in .NET 6 #38581
  • Blazor dotnet 6: OnLogInSucceeded not being hit on RemoteAuthenticatorView #38580
  • Please fix template for ASP.Net + React #38579
  • .Net Core 6 Signal R Client to .Net Core 2 Signal R 1.0 Server #38577
  • Hotreload doesn't work on Blazo wasm (.NET6) #38576
  • [API Review] Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38573
    7.0-preview1
  • Misleading comment about UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction #38572
    .NET 7 Planning
  • AddOption/Service.Configure creating duplicated entries #38569
    .NET 7 Planning
  • MapFallbackToPage("/_Host") triggers AmbiguousMatchException in mixed Razor Pages / Blazor Server app with .NET 6.0 #38566
  • How to use IFormFile in .Net 6 #38562
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload cli not working #38561

Closed

  • Hot reload breaks between compilations #36595
    .NET 7 Planning
  • @inject IWebHostEnvironment Environment in Page not working in .NET 6 #38384
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Implementing a custom IServer is not as easy as it should be now that some classes have been made internal #38503
  • Comma needs to be deleted #38578
  • Blazor Client-Server: Inconsistent Json serialization (camelCase ⟷ PascalCase) #38353
  • Adding any IHostedService via AddHostedService blocks Kestrel from starting on net6.0 VS2022 #38554
  • problem converting a 3.1 core app to 6.0, routing is using more than 12-13 gig of ram #38444
  • .NET6 PublishSingleFile got a Empty path name is not legal. (Parameter 'path') error #38493
  • Blazor wasm: Reference Javascript function with IJSObjectReference #38517
  • ValidationMessage doesn't work for Fluent RuleForEach #38571
  • [Blazor] SVG, emit numeric attributes with InvariantCulture #38568
  • user-secrets does not function on ubuntu 18.04 #32576
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IIS ApplicationInitialization tests are not running on helix #37419
    7.0-preview1
  • [Discussion] Announcement: TryParse and BindAsync discovery on Map* parameters will throw for invalid methods #36810
    Discussions
  • Lightweight and fast alternative to Partial View #38551
  • Problem with OpenId authentication on Blazor serverside. #38317
  • Error after update node_modules in template ASP.NET CORE with React.js #38359
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #38556
  • unsubscribe message or remove handlers in signalr? #38489
  • Possible bug in Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview (64-bit) Version 17.0.0 Preview 6.0? #38365

PullRequests

Created

  • Split shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `3e0e32b` #38567
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Write static header names #38565
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38563
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • HTTP/3: Remove TCS allocation with resettable value source #38560
    area-runtime

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Remove AsTask allocations #38559
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove Arm64-specific jobs in matrix pipelines #38564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix a tiny typo #38574
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38534
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Resolve component governance bugs #38539
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • KeyValue arguments in "dotnet-trace collect --providers" is not parsed correctly. #2691
    7.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace`: WSL2 issues when using `/mnt/c` #2628
    7.0.0

Updated

  • BasicProcessInfoNoSuspendTest and BasicProcessInfoNoSuspendTestAsync are flaky #2760

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to stable branch for December release #2759

Merged

  • Fix parse dotnet trace providers option #2730

Updated

  • Use new set of analyzers #2744
  • Add couple of smaller enhancements in dsrouter. #2344

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS CollectionView thows exception when adding items to an ObservableCollection #3514
  • In WinUI, parent measure override not called while children collection change in dynamic time #3512
  • Navigation back causing app to crash #3511
  • In iOS, grid children's positions is not working in load time #3510
  • In preview 10 absolute layout draw override method not called #3509
  • Maui-WinUI : Unable to re use the path for gap filled arc shape drawing #3507
  • BackgroundColor Animation not working on certain controls on Windows #3506
  • RandomNumberGenerator.GetInt32 throws DllNotFoundException on iOS #3505
  • Picker doesn't visually update its selected value on iOS #3504
  • System.TypeLoadException: VTable setup of type BindableObject failed #3501
  • System.MissingMethodException #3500
  • SupportedOSPlatformVersion 10.0.22000.0 cannot be higher than TargetPlatformVersion 10.0.19041.0 #3499

Closed

  • The minimum value in the slider is not being updated. #3498
  • Image not displaying background color on Windows #3478

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround #3514 #3516
  • Set the correct current page when popping #3515
  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513

Merged

  • [Windows] Button border properties #3409
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • iOS 13+ always uses the scenes if there is one registered in the manifest #3454
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update Entry and Editor to use Windows 11 styles #3444
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Add demands for macOS #3508
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Slider issues using Minimum and Maximum values #3503
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix issue setting the Image Background #3502
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:

Updated

  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Modifed XAML Source Generator to emit MemberNotNull attributes for named XAML controls #3497
    area/Xaml </>
  • Several fixes and changes to the dispatchers #3453
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • Add extension to add an IView to a GridLayout at specific column/row #3484
    area/layout 🔲
  • Minimal changes required to support remotewebview #3496
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Which fluent builder APIs can I safely omit when not using code generation or migrations? #26792
  • RelationalConnection.Close calls async function #26790
  • [Q] SqlServerConventionSetBuilder and valueGenerationConvention [SqlServerValueGenerationConvention] #26789
  • Entity's state should be modified if entity's owned object is modified. #26783
  • Migrations bundle EF core 6 error #26782
  • Add more DateTimeOffset member translations #26781
  • Use SQL Server datetime2 functions when translating DateTime.Now and DateTime.UtcNow #26780
  • Many To Many Exception when adding and removing same entity #26779

Closed

  • Use implicit usings #26773
    7.0.0
  • Use file scoped namespaces #26772
    7.0.0
  • Build started... Build succeeded. System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Diagnostics.IDiagnosticsLogger`1[Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbLoggerCategory+Scaffolding]' while attempting to activate 'MySql.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.MySQLDatabaseModelFactory'. #26777
  • Add-Migration : Exception calling "Start" with "1" argument(s): "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform." #26770

PullRequests

Created

  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
  • Call sync connection close instead of async #26793
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26788
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26786
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26785
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26784
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Use file-scoped namespaces and implicit usings in tests #26778

Updated

  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776
